### shouldScheduleAdjacent() {#a7e77f4c39d6175deb3eee55c6ce77932}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool shouldScheduleAdjacent (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> &amp; TII, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetsubtargetinfo">TargetSubtargetInfo</a> &amp; TSI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; FirstMI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; SecondMI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> if the instr pair, FirstMI and SecondMI, should be fused together.

Given SecondMI, when FirstMI is unspecified, then check if SecondMI may be part of a fused pair at all.

Definition at line <a href="#l00035">35</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86macrofusion-cpp">X86MacroFusion.cpp</a>.
